Sykdomspulsen core is a free and open-source health surveillance system designed and developed by the Norwegian Institute of Public Health.

The package is undergoing development now at https://github.com/folkehelseinstituttet/sc

You can subscribe to our newsletter to be notified when Sykdomspulsen Core is ready for public use.
